thread.title: Denise Miller
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Denise Miller

author: Denise Miller
title: Denise Miller
text:
I am more than delighted with my order and your service. Due to a technical error a different bouquet had been sent which were still gorgeous, however when I told them it was not as ordered they sent out my corrected order FOC and could not apologise enough which is amazing service. I ordered 40 Roses plus delivery for Â£25 and you can not find this offer any where else plus they were the most magnificent roses I had seen and the quality and colour of each rose was fantastic plus the added small box of chocolates was the icing on the birthday cake so to speak. I posted pictures on FB and 3 of my friends have since placed orders and are equally delighted. I will be placing all my flower orders on here now and recommend everyone else to do so.
Thank you for your amazing service.
